translation.en: Feel free to take a seat in front of the backdrop.
I will be with you in a moment.
We're also running a deal where you can get your pictures printed
on a mug and a T-shirt.
How's this for a passport photo?
-Why didn't you text me？ -[Josh] Just got back just now.
translation.ko: - 왜 문자 안 했어? - 지금 막 왔어

translation.en: You really nailed this whole backpacking-American,
translation.ko: 배낭 여행하는 미국인 티가 제대로 나는데

translation.en: My hostel was in Amsterdam. New Zealand was last month.
You're supposed to follow every single word of my travel blog.
translation.ko: 내 여행 블로그 빠짐없이 보기로 했잖아
- 어떻게 된 거야? - 18개월 치를 어떻게 다 봐?

translation.en: I'm looking at the photos, though.
Still working in this place, I see.
[man] Don't let me interrupt you not doing your job, Abby.
I need you to take this to Santa's Village,
You didn't forget that Santa's Village starts tomorrow, did you?
translation.ko: 산타 마을이 내일 시작되는 거 잊은 건 아니지?

translation.en: How could I forget? It's my favorite time of year.
translation.ko: 어떻게 잊겠어요? 일 년 중 가장 좋아하는 때인데

translation.en: Are you here to buy something?
This is my oldest friend, Josh.
He's the one that got me into photography.
Remember that film camera, long ago that we were learning on?
translation.ko: 필름 카메라 기억해? 오래전에 같이 배웠잖아

translation.en: I think it's in a box. So you're not buying anything?
translation.ko: - 상자에 넣어둔 것 같아 - 그러니까 안 산다는 거죠?

translation.en: Oh, no. I'm just here to see Abby.
Then I have a box for you to take down to my car.
translation.ko: 이 상자 좀 내 차에 가져다줘요

translation.en: I wanted to look like you.
And she nailed it. Just for the family Christmas photo.
I put a little something special in there. I thought you'd need it.
translation.ko: 특별한 걸 좀 넣었어 필요할 거 같아서

translation.en: You know me so well, big sis.
What do you think of the tree?
The theme this year is "ornament splendor."
You can help me finish decorating the mantle.
I start holiday hours tomorrow, so I should be good, but thanks, Dad.
translation.ko: 내일부터 크리스마스 시즌 시작이라 괜찮을 거예요 고마워요, 아빠

translation.en: He still asks me the same thing, and I work with him.
translation.ko: 나한테도 맨날 같은 걸 물어보셔 같이 일하는데도 말이야

translation.en: I'm just saying you're welcome to join us at the law firm.
translation.ko: 우리 법률 사무소에서 일해도 좋다는 거야

translation.en: [Dad] Sarah and I have a great time working together,

translation.ko: - 그렇지 않니, 우리 세라? - 그렇고 말고요

translation.en: You do know that photography is a great hobby.
It's just not the safest career choice.
You realize you tell me the same thing every time I come home, right?
translation.ko: 집에 올 때마다 같은 얘기하시는 거 아시죠?

translation.en: Mm-hm, and that's because we're hoping that one day you'll actually hear us.
translation.ko: 언젠가 우리 말을 들을지 모르니까 계속 시도하는 거야

translation.en: Nope? Just me? Okay. I'm gonna top it off.
translation.ko: 없어요? 그럼 저만 먹을게요 꽉 채워서요

translation.en: [Mom] You are going to change your clothes for the photograph?
translation.ko: 사진 찍을 때 옷 갈아입을 거지?

translation.en: Gramps, I was wondering where you were hiding.
Hey, sweetheart. Come and give your grampops a hug.
translation.ko: 얘야, 이리 오거라 우리 손주 안아보자

translation.en: Ah, I see you're making your famous chili.
I made a vegetarian one for you and me. Shh!
-How's it going with your new roommates? -Ah, they are so boring.
translation.ko: - 새로 온 룸메이트는 어때요? - 너무 심심해

translation.en: They go to bed by nine o'clock.
Then they complain my music's too loud.
I'm losing my hair and I'm getting old. How else am I supposed to play it?
translation.ko: 머리가 다 빠지고 늙는 것 같단다 그럼 뭘 연주하라고

translation.en: The Sutton decorating parties are like Christmas cards coming to life,
translation.ko: 크리스마스 카드에서나 보던 파티를 빠질 수 없지

translation.en: not the little flimsy dollar-store ones.
translation.ko: 천원 숍 물건으로 하는 싸구려 파티가 아니잖아

translation.en: -What's going on, son? -Gramps! Look at you!
translation.ko: - 잘 지냈니, 얘야? - 할아버지 보기 좋구나!

translation.en: -Good to see you, man! Welcome back! -Good to see you, too.
-Looking good! -You, too. Back in town, huh?
Everybody's gonna be so excited you're here, it'll get them off my back.
translation.ko: 모두 반가워할 거야 이젠 내가 숨 좀 쉬겠네

translation.en: -[Dad] All right, son. -[Josh] Good to see you.
-Has he gotten cuter since he’s been away? -I know what y’all are tryin’ to do.
translation.ko: - 그사이에 더 귀여워진 거야? - 꿍꿍이 다 알아

translation.en: -It’s not gonna work. We’re just friends. -Okay.
translation.ko: - 기대하지 마, 우린 그냥 친구야 - 알았어

translation.en: So Josh, where are you off to next?
[Abby] What? You didn't tell me that!
Well, I'm staying with Fernando up until I find my own place,
translation.ko: 집 찾을 때까지 페르난도랑 있을 거야

translation.en: but one thing I do know is that
it's time for our Sutton holiday photo! -Let's do it! -[all speak at once]
translation.ko: 가족사진 찍을 시간이라는 거죠 어서요, 사진 찍어요

translation.en: -Can I get an "ornaments" on three? -[Mom] Yes.
Beautiful. Now can I get some smiles?
Smiles is what I need. I love a smile.
translation.ko: 이제 미소 지어주세요 미소가 참 좋아요

translation.en: [Josh] I think we should go with the silly one. You have to.
translation.ko: 다 같이 웃긴 표정 짓자 꼭 해야 한다

translation.en: [Abby] All right, you bunch of hams.
[Gramps] I didn't want to give you this in front of everyone.
I found it when I was packing my old house.
She wanted you to have it.
First Christmas without her is tough.
translation.ko: 할머니가 안 계신 첫 번째 크리스마스라 힘드네요

translation.en: -[Abby] How you doing? -She's with me everyday.
I must admit it was hard to move, but,
she wouldn't want me to live in that big house by myself.
translation.ko: 그 큰 집에서 혼자 사는 걸 원하지 않았을 거 같아

translation.en: The kind the Europeans used to make before those flimsy, cardboard-paper kind.
translation.ko: 유럽에서 만들던 건데 요즘 나오는 판지로 만든 싸구려랑은 달라

translation.en: Are you sure she wanted me to have it and not Sarah?
translation.ko: 세라가 아니라 제가 가져도 될까요? 세라 스타일인데요
세라가 아니라 제가 가져도 될까요? 세라 스타일인데요 응, 그렇단다

translation.en: Son, after all the years I’ve known you, I’ve never seen you
How am I gonna say "no" to Miss Judy’s baking?
translation.ko: 주디 아줌마의 과자를 어떻게 안 받아요?

translation.en: So, you going to stick around for a while, right?
-I'm here. -[Abby] Josh, I love it when you’re here.
translation.ko: - 네, 여기 있어요 - 조시, 네가 여기 있는 게 좋아

translation.en: Your appetite distracts Mom from hounding me about my life choices.

translation.en: Y'know, she actually asked me what I thought about your life choices.
translation.ko: 있잖아 네 직업에 대해서 나한테 물어보시던데, 그러니까 내 말은

translation.en: So, technically... you ain’t off the hook yet.
translation.ko: 네 직업에 대해서 나한테 물어보시던데, 그러니까 내 말은 아직 완전히 벗어난 건 아니야

translation.en: -I love you, Gramps. -I love you more, sweetheart.
[Gramps] I'll see you in a few.

translation.ko: 여행 다 한 거면 그럼 은퇴네

translation.en: I just want to settle down.
Traveling just gave me a voice as a photographer.
translation.ko: 여행 덕분에 어떤 사진을 찍고 싶은지 알게 됐어

translation.en: I know what I want to do.
I’m taking pictures. Just not the ones I want.
[Abby] Burnt out from being at the studio all day.
translation.ko: 종일 스튜디오에 있다 보면 힘이 빠져

translation.en: Think I’ve just... lost my spark.
If I could have one thing…
A place where we could create and...
help support one another and be like...
the center for new talent in the area.
Oh, no, I-- I like that. That sounds amazing.
The owner wants a year's rent,
-So why don’t you just-- -[stuttering] Don’t say “Ask my parents."
translation.ko: - 그럼 왜 그냥... - 부모님한테 부탁하지 않냐고?

translation.en: I think they’re growing tired of my starving-artist life.
translation.ko: 굶주린 예술가의 삶에 지쳐가시는 것 같아

translation.en: You know what? I hate to admit it,
but working at my dad’s law firm doesn’t sound as terrible as it used to.
translation.ko: 아빠 법률 회사에서 일하는 게 예전처럼 끔찍하게 들리지 않아
상상만 해도 내가 다 숨 막힌다

translation.en: It’s easy for you to say. You’ve been traveling the world,
taking photos, inspiring people, dating interesting people,
translation.ko: 사진 찍고 흥미로운 사람들을 만나고 데이트도 하고 말이야

translation.en: too scared to leave my crappy day job
translation.ko: 두려워서 끔찍한 가게 일도 못 그만두고

translation.en: that I use as an excuse to not take my kind of photos.
translation.ko: 그걸 변명으로 원하는 사진도 못 찍는데 말이야

translation.en: I just blurted all that out.
Will you help me drop off my bags before heading to Nando’s?
translation.ko: 페르난도 집에 가기 전에 가방 내리는 걸 도와줄래?

translation.en: not to turn into an office zombie.
This is like a whole new place.
-[Josh chuckling] Look. My picture. -Oh, you mean my picture.
translation.ko: - 봐, 내 사진... - 내 사진 말하는 거야?

translation.en: It’s my picture. I took it. I made this.
Yeah, but you gave it to me. It’s mine.
translation.ko: 그래, 근데 나한테 줬잖아 그러니 내 거지

translation.en: You know what’s funny? I got the same thing on my computer.
translation.ko: 재밌는 건 내 컴퓨터에도 똑같은 게 있어

translation.en: [Abby gasps] Ah, look at us. Best friends forever.
Where did all this come from? This wasn't hanging here before.
translation.ko: 이거 다 어디서 온 거야? 전에도 걸렸었나?

translation.en: I want to be fearless enough to go after my dreams, like you.
translation.ko: 너처럼 겁내지 않고 꿈을 좇는 거야

translation.en: [Josh] Look at this photo. People need to see this.
translation.ko: 이 사진 봐 이런 건 사람들이 봐야 해

translation.en: Yeah, I don’t-- I ca-- I’m not ready.
[Josh] And what d'you think will happen if...
you just let go and went for it?
I don’t know. I’d probably worry less.
Get some of these questions about my future answered.
translation.ko: 미래에 대한 궁금증이 좀 더 해결되지 않을까?

translation.en: It’s like a Christmas doll house… thing. Wha--
Try and open one of the doors.
I don't know. Maybe it just doesn’t open. I don’t know. Maybe it’s broke.
translation.ko: 모르겠어, 안 열리는 것 같아 고장 난 건가?

translation.en: Maybe Gramps just gave me a defective calendar.
translation.ko: 할아버지가 고장 난 달력을 줬는지도 몰라

translation.en: -in the Christmas spirit, too? -You got somewhere to be?
translation.ko: - 내기를 원하셨나 봐 - 넌 어디 갈 데 없는 거니?

translation.en: You’re s'posed to take me to Fernando’s.
translation.ko: - 페르난도 집에 데려다준다며 - 크리스마스 얘기 계속할 거면

translation.en: Not when you keep talkin’ about Christmas stuff all the time.
translation.ko: - 페르난도 집에 데려다준다며 - 크리스마스 얘기 계속할 거면 - 안 데려다 주고 - 까먹었구나, 까먹었어

translation.en: Let the 24 days of holiday hell begin.
Guess you decided to work after all.
Everyone will have their time with Santa. Okay?
-[Santa] There you go, sweetheart. -[Singh] Very nice.
That’s very nice. You keep your list. Okay.
[Singh] Okay. Who’s the next kid? Who’s the next in line?
I thought we had extra help this year.
All the college students I hired got poached by the Christmas train.
translation.ko: 채용한 대학생들이 모두 크리스마스 기차로 옮겨갔다고

translation.en: That's it. I'm calling in the cavalry.
[Santa] Fernando! It's such a pleasure to see you.
Josh, yes. I know you. You can help me wrangle the kids.
translation.ko: 맞아 조시, 너 안다 나랑 애들 다루는 거 도와줘

translation.en: Hey, what about me? [sings] Elf Fernan... do! What can I do?
That kind of enthusiasm gets you on crowd control.
I also work as a Uber driver,
a dog walker, and a Christmas caroler.
translation.ko: 개 산책도 시키고 크리스마스 캐럴도 불렀어요

translation.en: I’m not sure why you told me about the first two, but...
you can sing to the children as they impatiently wait in line.
translation.ko: 어쨌건 애들이 줄에서 보채면 노래 불러줘라

translation.en: I’m not going to disappoint you, Santa.
Great! Okay, let’s see some Christmas cheer.
Wanna go see that guy? You know who that guy is.
Santa Claus. Tell him anything. Anything you want.
I promise overtime and holiday pay.
translation.ko: 초과 근무랑 휴일 근무 수당 책임질게

translation.en: Stop. I’ve always wanted to be in an elf costume, so thank you.
translation.ko: 그만해 항상 요정 코스튬을 입어보고 싶었어, 고마워

translation.en: [Singh] That was a good one. I can feel it.
Let’s go. This job is awesome. Let’s go.
translation.ko: 어서 가자, 어서 가 이거 재밌네

translation.en: -We were supposed to meet for lunch. -I know.
Urgent matter. Okay? Had to go to my apartment…
I didn’t know we were doing presents.
I didn’t get you anything. You don’t have to.
translation.ko: - 난 준비한 게 없어 - 그럴 필요 없어

translation.en: Plus, I know you’re on this anti-commercial holiday kick.
Look, it’s not even a Christmas present.
It’s just a gift I’m getting you around this time of year. Coincidence.
translation.ko: 그냥 주고 싶어서 주는 거야 이맘때 주는 선물이야 그냥 우연이지

translation.en: -If you don’t want it-- -I don't want to be rude.
-Can I open it now? -What you waitin’ on?
-Really. They're like-- -[Josh] Actually, I should have.
translation.ko: 정말로, 이거 정말... - 그럴 필요 있었지, 왠지 알아? - 왜?
- 그럴 필요 있었지, 왠지 알아? - 왜?

translation.en: -all this duct tape on your shoes-- -That’s what makes ’em cool.
translation.ko: - 네 신발에 붙인 테이프들... - 멋지라고 붙인 거야

translation.en: I thought they looked like you.
-I am so sorry, OK. It's the weekend... -♪...and a happy new year ♪
[Abby] Oh, I almost forgot to tell you.
Yesterday I woke up, and the door for December 1st was open.
-Must be on a timer or something, right? -Was there something cool inside?
translation.ko: - 타이머 같은 게 있나 봐 - 안에 뭐 신기하게 있었어?

translation.en: Just little toys. But get this.
But, wait. I want to tell her.
the greatest Christmas movie of all time is playing at The Roxy
A Christmas Story. And the three of us are going together!
translation.ko: '크리스마스 스토리' 우리 셋이 같이 갈 거야?

translation.en: Maybe four of us, if I find a girlfriend, but that’s probably not gonna happen.
translation.ko: 여자 친구가 생기면 넷이 될 수도! 근데 힘들 거야

translation.en: It’s amazing because everyone dresses up as their favorite character.
translation.ko: 모두 원하는 캐릭터 옷으로 입고 온다니 재미있겠다

translation.en: Oh. I got dibs on the leg lamp.
translation.ko: 아, 레그 램프 코스튬은 내 거야

translation.en: The leg lamp is my costume. Okay? [angrily] Back off! My idea!
translation.ko: 아니 내 거야? 알겠어? 양보하라고, 내 생각이었잖아

translation.en: That... is a Christmas tradition I can get behind.
translation.ko: 카메라 뒤로 가는 게 크리스마스 전통이지

translation.en: [Abby] That tree came out of nowhere!
[man] I'm so sorry. I guess I didn't tie it down properly.
translation.ko: 정말 죄송해요 - 제대로 묶지 못했나 봐요 - 아니, 누가 차 위에 나무를

translation.en: Who doesn’t tie down a tree that’s on top of their car?
translation.ko: - 제대로 묶지 못했나 봐요 - 아니, 누가 차 위에 나무를 그렇게 묶어요?

translation.en: [man] That would be me. Are you okay? How’s your car?

translation.ko: 괜찮아요 제 잘못이에요 트리 가게에서 고무끈을

translation.en: The guy at the tree farm recommended bungees, not twine, I didn't listen.
translation.ko: 제 잘못이에요 트리 가게에서 고무끈을 권했는데 제가 듣지 않았어요

translation.en: Yeah, well there’s a reason why twine jumping never caught on.
translation.ko: 그래서 노끈 줄넘기가 인기 없는 거예요

translation.en: It's a good sign if you can make bad jokes at a time like this.
translation.ko: 이런 상황에 그런 농담을 하다니 좋은 징조네요

translation.en: I’m pretty sure it died when I chopped it down.
translation.ko: 뿌리를 잘랐을 때 이미 죽은 것 같은데요

translation.en: That would make you an ax murderer.
I’m wanted at three different Christmas tree farms.
translation.ko: 크리스마스트리 농장 세 군데에서 절 찾고 있어요

translation.en: I’m gonna have to make a citizen’s arrest.
[laughing] Okay, you win. I can’t keep up.
It’s from my emergency roadside assistance kit, and technically,
translation.ko: 긴급 상황에 쓰려고 가지고 있던 거예요 그러니까

translation.en: I should probably do this with a bigger car.
I didn’t sleep very much last night.
She found it in a shop in France just before we met.
translation.ko: 우리가 만나기 전에 프랑스의 한 상점에서 발견했지

translation.en: I was on leave from the Air Force.
translation.ko: 나는 공군에 있을 때였는데 휴가 중이었어

translation.en: We passed each other in the entrance to the Louvre.
She dropped a book in the snow and...
I can’t believe I never knew any of this.
This is the time of the year I miss her the most.
It’s funny, 'cause she was so much like you.
Never bought into all this holiday hoopla.
translation.ko: 할머니도 크리마스의 시끌벅적한 분위기를 좋아하지 않았어

translation.en: Well, it looks like you have plenty of company, if you want it.
translation.ko: 원하시기만 하면 친구 사귀는 게 쉽겠는걸요

translation.en: That’s the problem with having a great love.
translation.ko: 진정한 사랑을 경험하면 이런 게 문제란다

translation.en: The “pretty good” ones don’t stand a chance.
I’m heading to meet the guys over at the hobby shop. You want to join?
translation.ko: 모형 상점에 가서 친구들 만나기로 했어 같이 갈래?

translation.en: Just a bunch of old cats playing with toy trains.
translation.ko: 장난감 기차 가지고 노는 늙은이들이 괜찮다면

translation.en: I’ll see you at Corinne’s Christmas pageant later.
Is that today? Ah, I totally forgot. Don’t tell Sarah.
That calendar’s just a calendar, right?
translation.ko: 이 달력 말이에요 그냥 달력이죠, 그렇죠?

translation.en: Come here! You were so fantastic, Corinne.
I think I was the only one without a camera phone in front of my face.
translation.ko: 휴대폰으로 사진 찍지 않는 사람은 나밖에 없었나 봐

translation.en: You were the best Sugar Plum Fairy up there.
translation.ko: 사탕 요정 중에 네가 제일 잘하던데

translation.en: [laughs] Okay, but it’s not a competition.
Everyone is the best just for participating.
[lowers voice] But she was the best by far.
By any chance, did you murder my tree with your car?
translation.ko: 혹시 차로 제 나무를 친 분 아니세요?

translation.en: First of all, that tree was already a goner.
Any chance I could get the name of my accomplice in tree crimes?
-You have a kid that goes here? -No way. I don’t have a kid.
translation.ko: - 아이가 여기 다녀요? - 아니요, 애 없어요

translation.en: Don’t get me wrong. I want kids maybe... one day.
I just haven’t made one yet.
But I do have a niece, Corinne.
with the rest of the other staring people.
[Dad] I don't know who she's talking to.
There she is! Hey, come over here, Jess!
Don’t judge her outfit too harshly. I’m a single dad with no sewing skills.
translation.ko: 의상이 좀 엉망이죠, 혼자 살아서 바느질 솜씨가 별로예요

translation.en: -I should probably get her home. -Yeah. No, it’s getting late.
-It was great running into you again. -So great seeing you.
Do you know who that was?
Ty hit me with a tree.
Ty Walker is the school's most eligible bachelor.
translation.ko: 타이 워커는 학교에서 가장 근사한 싱글이야

translation.en: Amicable divorce, great job, and that’s all his hair.
translation.ko: 사이 좋게 이혼했고 직장도 좋고 헤어스타일 끝내주잖니

translation.en: Some of the single moms actually wear their nice yoga pants
to drop off their kids, all in hopes to get a piece of him.
translation.ko: 꽉 끼는 요가 바지 입고 온다 어떻게 한 번 만나볼까 하는 거지

translation.en: And here he is, flirting with my little sister.
translation.ko: 그런데 내 동생이 이렇게 썸을 타고 있다니

translation.en: God, you’re gonna use this to lord over them with, aren’t you?
translation.ko: 맙소사, 설마 이거 가지고 아줌마들한테 잘난 척하진 않겠지?

translation.en: Oh, you have no idea how cutthroat elementary school is.
translation.ko: 초등학교가 얼마나 치열한지 넌 모를 거야

translation.en: Speaking of, I need you to come through with some awesome
translation.ko: 참, 멋진 사진 좀 준비해줄래? 학교 자선 경매에 사용할 거야

translation.en: photos for the school’s charity auction. It’s the 22nd.
I am gonna crush this auction.
-[Mom] Are you heading out? -Yeah. See you guys later.
You’re scaring me with your panicked text messages.
translation.ko: 그렇게 놀래서 문자를 보내니 걱정돼서 혼났네

translation.en: I have to tell you something, but I need you to not think
translation.ko: 말해 줄 게 있어 대신에 오해하지 마
말해 줄 게 있어 대신에 오해하지 마 나 정신 똑바르니까

translation.en: That ship has sailed. Can you just tell me?
translation.ko: 그러기엔 늦은 것 같은데 그냥 말해주면 안 돼?

translation.en: -[Josh] Oh, the... three little toys. -[Abby] Right.
translation.ko: 아... - 맞아 - 꼬맹이 장난감 세 개네

translation.en: How much wine have you had tonight?
Yeah, I gave you boots. But...
I got those when I was away,
not because of a freaky calendar telling me to do so.
translation.ko: 귀신 들린 달력이 시킨 게 아니고

translation.en: And maybe because I'm a wonderful friend
-an equally as dope gift in return. -Josh!
translation.ko: 나도 근사한 선물을 받지 않을까 하고
나 돌아버릴 것 같아 제발 집중해

translation.en: Day two, I got a Christmas tree toy and then the car ran over a Christmas tree.
translation.ko: 크리스마스트리 장난감이 나왔어 차로 진짜 나무를 쳤다고
이럴 확률이 얼마나 될 것 같아?

translation.en: Right, that is a little weird, but...
that just seems like a coincidence.
d'you kick somebody in the nutcracker?

translation.ko: 근데 오늘 밤 커린의 경연 대회에서

translation.en: I met the daughter of the guy whose Christmas tree I ran over,
translation.ko: 차로 나무를 쳤던 남자의 딸을 만난 거야

translation.en: and his daughter was dressed as a nutcracker.
translation.ko: 그 애가 호두까기 인형 옷을 입고 있었어

translation.en: And the strangest part about that is, I actually hit it off with her dad.
translation.ko: 근데 가장 이상한 점은 그 애 아빠랑 내가 썸을 탔어

translation.en: Are we talking about him or the calendar?
translation.ko: 근데 그 사람 얘기하는 거야? 아니면 달력?

translation.en: What else do you think is inside?
I don’t know. The door doesn’t open until midnight.
Well, I’ll wait up with you.
Was thinking about going to get some water.
You want some water? I want some water.
Ha, ha, ha, you're so funny.

translation.ko: - 네가 했잖아? - 아니야, 내가 한 거 아니야

translation.en: [Abby] It looks like the wind's picking up.
[Josh] Thank you all for coming to Santa’s village.
D'you feel like you’re waiting for something to happen? ’Cause I do.
translation.ko: 뭔가 일어날 것 같은 기분 알아? 난 아는데

translation.en: You know it doesn’t help that we’re in candy cane central.
translation.ko: 지팡이 사탕 광장에 있으면 별 소용이 없잖아

translation.en: [Josh] Hey, kid, you ready to go see Santa Claus?
-[woman] Please. Do it for Mama, Mason. -It’s Santa Claus.
-[Josh] Come on, kid. -[Mason] I don't wanna go.
translation.ko: - 이리로, 어서 가자, 얘야 - 가기 싫어요

translation.en: Get your picture taken with old Santa.
Now look right there in the camera.
-Ow! Hey! -[Singh] Where are your paren-- Hey!
No, you might’ve sprained that. I think you should get that checked out.
translation.ko: 삔 것 같은데 병원에 가서 확인해보는 게 좋겠어

translation.en: It’s no big deal. I’m good.
-Go to the clinic, please. -There’s a line of people waiting
translation.ko: - 제발 병원에 가봐 - 사람들이 줄 서서 기다리잖아

translation.en: to get their picture with Santa. I can't just leave.
translation.ko: 산타랑 사진 찍으러 왔는데 어떻게 가니?

translation.en: Who else do you know that’s a photographer? Hmm.
translation.ko: 사진사가 너 말고 또 있는 거 잊었어?

translation.en: You should go. I can’t have runaway candy cane injuries on my conscience.
translation.ko: 다녀와, 양심에 걸려서 지팡이 사탕에 다친 거 모른 척 못 한다고

translation.en: Says here we have a potential sprain by candy cane.
translation.ko: 지팡이 사탕 때문에 삔 것 같다고 쓰여 있네요

translation.en: A lot of that going around lately.
Yeah, that’s me. Abby the mortified elf.
translation.ko: 네, 저예요 아주 창피스러운 요정 애비죠

translation.en: Oh, first the tree. Now this.
Nothing an ibuprofen and a drink won’t fix.
translation.ko: 소염제랑 한잔할 수 있으면 뭐든지 고칠 수 있죠

translation.en: Are you allowed to prescribe that?
That was actually my lame doctor way of asking you out.
translation.ko: 잠시 의사 신분을 빌려서 데이트 신청한 거예요

translation.en: I’ll see you around 6:00 at Santa’s village?
Must’ve got some good meds, huh?
I have a date with Ty tonight.
I was thinking of sneaking out around 5:00 to go home and change.
-Do you think you could cover for me? -Yeah.
There’s a guy? I thought you were the guy.
translation.ko: 남자라고? 난 네가 그 남자인 줄 알았는데

translation.en: You got here just in time.
I didn’t know drinks were time-sensitive.
So, I got us this ride.
The nearest café is literally hundreds of steps away, and it could take us
translation.ko: 가장 가까운 카페에 가려면 꽤 걸어야 해요

translation.en: almost three minutes to walk there.
Plus, I already got us tickets, so…
This is not the drink I had imagined
when you asked me out on a date, but…
So, what else do you do when you’re not…
I want to be a photographer.
I mean, I am a photographer.
We take all the holiday photos that are probably hanging up on your fridge.
translation.ko: 냉장고에 걸어 놓을 크리스마스 사진을 찍어요

translation.en: But I don’t know how long I’m gonna work there. I mean, I--
translation.ko: 얼마나 오래 거기서 일할지는 모르겠어요, 제 말은...

translation.en: I want to have my own space.
that’s a long way off, I mean, if it happens at all--
translation.ko: 갈 길이 멀어요, 그러니까 가능하다고 해도 말이죠

translation.en: Uh, both my parents are surgeons,
So you just got into the family business?
But I’m the rebel for opening a clinic instead of becoming a surgeon.
translation.ko: 근데 저는 외과 의사가 되지 않고 제 병원을 열었으니 반항아죠

translation.en: I would rebel in that way.
We should do it again sometime.
I’ve been wanting to kiss you all night.
-You don’t have my number. -What are you waiting for?
-[Josh] What’s up? How are you? -What up?
Looks like you got your photo mojo back.
translation.ko: 다시 사진 찍고 싶은가 봐 글쎄, 모르겠는데

translation.en: What’s creepy calendar? Come on. What did it predict today?
translation.ko: 그 으스스한 달력은 어때? 오늘의 예언은 뭐야?

translation.en: I don’t know. I decided to risk it and not check.
translation.ko: 몰라, 모험해 보려고 확인 안 했어

translation.en: Well, tell me about this ride with the doc.
You gotta give him points for creativity.
I mean, did the date go well?
♪ I'm putting on my Christmas stockings ♪ ♪ Find a nice dress to wear ♪
♪ Better hurry There's no time to lose ♪ ♪ 'Cause I got so many Christmas kisses for you ♪
♪ The bells are ringing oh so pretty ♪
[Gramps] Haven’t seen much of you lately.
Is it work or that new fella's got you so preoccupied?
translation.ko: 일 때문에 바쁘니 아니면 새로 생긴 남자 친구?

translation.en: Now, you know Sarah’s been updating us.
planning these elaborate dates and showering me with gifts...
translation.ko: 공들여서 데이트를 계획하고 선물도 많이 해주는데

translation.en: I was gonna say “flattering,” but yeah,
We’re spending all this time together, but...
it’s not like we’re really getting to know each other.
translation.ko: 서로에 대해 알아가는 것 같지 않아요

translation.en: If you feel like he’s worth getting to know, you should

translation.ko: 가만히 있으면 안 될 것 같구나

translation.en: You can decide your next step based on what you learn.
translation.ko: 어떤 사람인지에 따라 그다음을 결정하지 않겠니

translation.en: -[Gramps] Age equals wisdom. -Oh, you’re so wise.

translation.ko: - 이거 글루텐 없어? - 챔피언이 먹는 아침이야

translation.en: I figured you and him would have gotten together by now.
translation.ko: 지금쯤에는 조시랑 같이 있을 줄 알았어

translation.en: Josh has girlfriends all over the world.
translation.ko: 쟤는 전 세계에 여자 친구들이 있어요

translation.en: Yeah, but he came back here, didn't he?
Hey! How about one of those cookies, son?
I got one with your name on it.

translation.ko: - 아, 저거 봐라 - 준비됐어요? - 그래 - 응

translation.en: -[Gramps] You got us. -[Abby] Caught in the act.
Um, well, we actually took a little vote and decided
that you can be the leg lamp.
[Fernando] For the movie, A Christmas Story.
I have a date, with Ty.
[Fernando] Fine. I will be the leg lamp.
Okay. I just need to find the leg, but--
I can still be the leg lamp.
I’m seeing him at three o'clock, so I can meet you at the theater after.
Does this look like a face that would break a promise?
translation.ko: 설마 약속 깰 얼굴로 보이는 건 아니겠지?

translation.en: I’m stumped. I have no idea what this date is.
[Ty] It is the season of giving.
And we’re gonna do a little giving back.
I try to come once a month.
I think it's important for her to know how fortunate we are.
translation.ko: 우리가 얼마나 운이 좋은지 느껴야 할 것 같아서요

translation.en: And you think I need that, too?
We all do. The real reward is
translation.ko: 우리 모두 필요하죠 진짜 보상은 이분들의 삶이

translation.en: knowing we make life a little better for these folks.
translation.ko: 좀 더 편해지도록 도울 수 있다는 점이에요

translation.en: Are saints like you allowed to date mere humans like me?
translation.ko: 성인 같은 말씀이네요, 저 같은 인간과 데이트하셔도 괜찮으세요?

translation.en: [Fernando] Do you think she’s gonna make it?
She said she's gonna come, she’s--
-We have time, man. -What are you doing with that cell phone?
translation.ko: - 시간 남았어 - 휴대폰으로 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: No one used cell phones in A Christmas Story.
-It’s 1983. -Can you get out of character for...
translation.ko: - 1983년이야 - 잠시 영화 생각 안 하면 안 돼?

translation.en: I don’t know what you’re talking about because I am Ralphie.
translation.ko: 무슨 말 하는지 모르겠군 난 랄피란 말이야

translation.en: Hey, excuse me. Do you guys mind if I take some pictures of you?
Oh, you can take mine, but, uh,
don’t take his ugly mug. It might break the camera.
translation.ko: 이 못생긴 친구는 찍지 마요 카메라가 망가질지도 몰라

translation.en: -I was pretty handsome in my younger days. -Oh...
You guys are old friends, huh?
I’ve been putting up with him for…
I have a best friend like that.
The guy that I’m dating brought me here.
Yeah, we’ve seen him here a few times.
translation.ko: 그래, 저 친구 몇 번 봤지

translation.en: Yeah, he likes to bring people by and, uh, show ’em how good he is.
translation.ko: 사람들 데려와서 자기가 얼마나 좋은 사람인지 보여주려고 하더군

translation.en: He said he brought his daughter here a few times.
I'm going to let you in on a little secret,
and it's not because you're enamored by my beauty.
translation.ko: 자네가 내 미모에 빠져서 알려주는 건 아니고 말이야

translation.en: People can show you whatever they want.
translation.ko: 사람들은 자신이 원하는 걸 보여주려 하지

translation.en: But it's how they make you feel... that counts.
translation.ko: 그런데 중요한 건... 내가 어떻게 느끼냐는 거지

translation.en: [man 2] And how you make them feel, too.
Oh yeah, let’s do one of these.
[cinema advert] You have 30 seconds to answer.
-[Fernando] Josh? -Which holiday movie has been remade
-You have 30 seconds to answer. -[Fernando] Get-- Okay.
I think I got some great shots.
You too. Have a great Christmas.
Looks like you made new friends.
-Have you ever talked to them? -So many people go through the food line,
translation.ko: - 말해 보신 적 있어요? - 음식 라인에 사람들이 많아서요

translation.en: Well, they have a really interesting history.
I try not to get too attached. It’s the doctor in me.
translation.ko: 너무 가까워지지 않으려고 해요 의사라서 그런가 봐요

translation.en: Yeah. No. Can we go to the Roxy?
A Christmas Story is playing, and--
What’s the big deal? It plays nonstop
translation.ko: 괜찮아요, 계속 상영 중이라고요 크리스마스 시즌 내내요

translation.en: -all through the holidays. -My friends are in there.
translation.ko: 괜찮아요, 계속 상영 중이라고요 크리스마스 시즌 내내요 친구들이 안에 있어요

translation.en: I said that I would see it with them.
You were doing something way more important than a movie.
translation.ko: 영화보다 훨씬 더 중요한 걸 하고 있었잖아요

translation.en: -These are great. Are all these yours? -Mm-hm.
You’re always taking pictures, aren’t you?
Uh, my friend Josh took that one.
Reminds me of one of Jess’s selfies.
Oh, we have one of these at our house.
-Except ours is made of cardboard. -Oh, yeah?
translation.ko: - 우리 건 판지로 만든 거지만요 - 그래요?

translation.en: Oh, wait. Uh, no, no, no. It’s really--
It’s an antique, so it’s, like--
What kind of candy is in yours?
I just realized something and it shouldn't surprise me anymore,
translation.ko: 막 뭔가 깨달았는데요 이젠 놀랍지도 않아요

translation.en: the day that I met you,
I got a Christmas tree toy from the calendar, and then...
your tree fell on my car.
It's been like that all month long.
the toy inside matches something that happens.
Like today, the men at the shelter were obviously the three wise men.
translation.ko: 오늘 쉼터에서 만난 분들이 세 명의 현자가 틀림없어요

translation.en: It sounds like the Christmas equivalent of having your horoscope read.
translation.ko: 당신에게 크리스마스는 점성술 읽는 거랑 비슷하네요

translation.en: “Oh, I’m a Virgo. My horoscope says I’m gonna meet someone new today.”
translation.ko: '처녀자리의 오늘 운은 새로운 사람을 만나게 됩니다'

translation.en: Well, of course, if you leave your house,
the chance of you meeting someone new increases exponentially.
translation.ko: 새로운 사람을 만날 가능성이 기하급수적으로 늘어나죠

translation.en: You mocked me a little. No?
-[Ty] Come on. It’s kinda funny. -It’s not funny.
Ah, you’re too smart to believe that
translation.ko: 장난감이 든 달력이 인생을 좌지우지한다고 믿기엔

translation.en: a toy-filled calendar is controlling your life.
translation.ko: 장난감이 든 달력이 인생을 좌지우지한다고 믿기엔 당신이 너무 똑똑하지 않나요?

translation.en: -I’m just being a realist here. -You’re kinda being a jerk
translation.ko: - 현실적으로 말하는 거예요 - 당신 좀 별로인 거 아세요?

translation.en: Why are you so sensitive all of a sudden?
Hey, Ty, I have a question.
How many girls have you taken to see you do good work at the shelter?
translation.ko: 쉼터에 여자 친구를 몇 명이나 데려갔나요?

translation.en: Well, the two wise men seem to think that’s a common date spot for you.
translation.ko: '두 명'의 현자는 쉼터가 당신의 데이트 장소라고 생각하던데요

translation.en: You’re taking dating advice from two guys that live on the street?
translation.ko: 길거리에 사는 사람들한테 데이트 충고를 듣는단 말이에요?

translation.en: I thought you cared about the people at the shelter.
-Or is that just all for show? -That’s not what I’m saying.
translation.ko: 쉼터는 보여주기 위한 건가요? 그런 말이 아니에요

translation.en: What do you know about me?
What do you know about me?
I mean, what do I even know about you, right?
translation.ko: 제가 당신에 대해 아는 건 뭐죠?

translation.en: We haven’t even had a real conversation up until now.
-I thought you were having a good time. -I am.
But I-- You know, I need more than someone that just looks good on paper.
translation.ko: 그런데 겉으로만 근사한 사람을 원하는 게 아니에요

translation.en: You know, I need someone real.
Someone who’s not gonna judge me.
You want to take some space...
You’re breaking up with me over a calendar?
I was with my gramps this morning, okay?
[sighing] You can open up that door
I’m in a fight with a calendar.
The mayor’s doing a tree-lighting ceremony.
I might have, sort of, broken up with Ty.
You might have? Sort of? You did?
I made the mistake of showing him my calendar.
It all went downhill from there.
You want me to go beat him up, or what?
No, he’s probably, like, a black belt in karate or something.
I feel like a jerk for missing the movie.
That wasn’t cool, standing me up. That’s--
I can't stay mad at that.
What are you two standing around for?
and her official photographer has the flu.
Grab your camera, Abby. They’re going to need pictures.
translation.ko: 애비, 카메라 가져와 사진 찍어야 해

translation.en: -♪ And a partridge in a pear tree ♪ -[mayor] Thank you so much for coming.
Come. The mayor wants to meet you.
Here. I’ll load it. Go meet the mayor.
translation.ko: 이리 줘, 내가 올릴게 가서 시장님 만나

translation.en: -Oh, thank you for coming. -[woman] Thank you.
I would like you to meet photographer, Abby Sutton.
translation.ko: 사진 찍었던 애비 서턴을 소개해 드릴게요

translation.en: and I'm sure you're going to be pleased with her work.
Thank you so much for stepping up today, Abby.
I can't wait to see your photographs.
Well, I've been working on a new series.
It's been focusing on capturing the town in unexpected ways.
Send me a link to your stuff.
I need some fresh images for my office.
-I'd love to see what you have. Okay. Bye. -[Singh] Merry Christmas.
translation.ko: - 작품을 보고 싶네요, 반가웠어요 - 메리 크리스마스

translation.en: Get me the best shots, and I’ll send them to the mayor
translation.ko: 가장 잘 찍은 걸로 나한테 보내줘 시장님이랑 신문사에 빨리 보낼게

translation.en: and to the newspaper before anybody else can.
The mayor wants to see my photography.
translation.ko: 시장이 내 사진을 보고 싶어 해

translation.en: It’s the break I’ve been looking for.
I don’t like that face. What’s going on?
When I was trying to load the card in the computer…
...this family came by, was talking to me,
asking about when Santa Claus was coming back.
when they was talking to me, I…
I'm working on recovering the photos, but there's no guarantee that it will work.
translation.ko: 복구 작업 중이에요 성공한다는 보장은 없지만요

translation.en: You should pack your things and go.
I just heard you talking to Singh. What did he say?
Are you going to re-shoot the mayor?
I would if I didn’t just get fired.
-Seriously? -Yep! I'm giving my job to you. Congrats.
It was my fault. Look. I can go tell Singh right now.
translation.ko: 내 실수잖아 지금 사장님한테 가서 말할게

translation.en: It's my card. It's my responsibility. I'm the one who let it outta my sight.
translation.ko: 내 카드였어, 내 책임이고 내 실수야

translation.en: But you gave it to me.
There's no reason for both of us to lose our jobs.
translation.ko: 둘 다 일자리를 잃을 필요 없잖아

translation.en: You knew how much I needed this break, and now it's ruined.
translation.ko: 이번 기회를 얼마나 원했는지 알잖아, 이제 다 망쳤어

translation.en: So yeah, I'm mad at you.
I would never do anything to hurt you ever,
translation.ko: 네게 상처 줄 일은 절대 하지 않아

translation.en: but I can’t help the fact that I’m still angry, at you.
translation.ko: 알아, 그런데 아직도 화나는 건 어쩔 수가 없어

translation.en: you standing me up for Mr. Dream Doctor Dude-
translation.ko: 이상형 의사 아저씨 때문에 날 바람 맞힌 거...

translation.en: I don’t need you, and I don’t need this job, and I don’t need any of this.
translation.ko: 너도 필요 없고 이 일자리도 필요 없어, 다 필요 없다고

translation.en: That’s not how friends treat each other, Abby.
translation.ko: 애비, 친구 사이에 이러는 거 아니야

translation.en: [woman] You just answered so I know you are.
Sarah, I really don’t feel like having any…
It reeks like a pity party in here.
Gramps. He ran into Josh while hoofing it down Main Street.
translation.ko: 할아버지한테, 시내에서 걷다가 조시를 우연히 만나셨대

translation.en: Great. My personal drama is trending.
And losing a job, even a crappy one, sucks even more.
But pushing away the people that care about you is just selfish, Abs.
translation.ko: 그래도 널 아끼는 사람들을 이렇게 밀어내는 건 이기적이야

translation.en: If you came here to try to make me feel better, it's not working.
worships you, and no matter how bad you may...
translation.ko: 너라면 끔찍하게 생각해 아무리 네 인생이

translation.en: she’s still going to worship you.
All she’s been talking about is how her cool Aunt Abby
translation.ko: 애비 이모가 내일 경매에 얼마나 멋진 사진을 가져올지

translation.en: is bringing her pictures to the auction tomorrow.
Can I please just send the photos with you?
I really don’t want to see anyone,
especially Ty. I do not want to see him.
Which is why I’m here to tell you to get it together.
translation.ko: 그래서 내가 여기 온 거야 빨리 추슬러

translation.en: Because I will not let you disappoint Corinne,
and I definitely won’t let you give up on yourself.
translation.ko: 더욱 중요한 건 너 자신을 포기하지 말라고

translation.en: You know you’re my favorite sister,
-I think I’m your only sister. - Okay. Go take a shower.
translation.ko: - 나 말고 동생이 또 있으신가 - 그래, 알았으니까 샤워해

translation.en: You smell like Cheetos and sadness.
Is this place no longer for rent?
Your tough love worked. I decided to stop feeling sorry for myself and...
translation.ko: 강하게 키워줘서 고마워 더 우울해하지 않고

translation.en: I have a surprise for you.
For the auction. I think you’re gonna like it.
translation.ko: 그러니까 경매 말이야 언니가 좋아할 거야

translation.en: My sister’s donations are in her car.
Can you get someone to unload them, please?
You’re having way too much fun throwing your PTA president power around.
translation.ko: 학부모 회장 권력 맛에 너무 빠져있는 거 아니야?

translation.en: [girl in crowd] Santa’s right there. I’m so excited.
If you're looking for Josh, he's not here.
He quit. After I fired you,
he came around talking about solidarity,
how you took the fall for him.
translation.ko: 어떻게 네가 대신 책임을 썼는지 늘어놓더군

translation.en: I can’t believe Josh quit for me.
translation.ko: 나 때문에 그만두다니 믿을 수 없어요

translation.en: I wanted to give this to you.
It's the pictures from the tree-lighting ceremony.
I wasn't able to salvage all of them, but there might be...
ones on there that you can use.
I mean, it’s probably too late, but...
I’ll send them to the mayor’s office.
it’s going to be a Christmas massacre here,
translation.ko: 이 사람들이 산타 사진을 못 받으면

translation.en: if these people don’t get their Santa photos.
Uh, Mrs. Singh, the lens cap.
You don't have to tell my wife what to do, Bob.
And if you want your old job back, it is yours.
I appreciate every opportunity that you’ve given me, Mr. Singh, but I...
I think it's time for a change.
We are so proud of you.
Honey, I know we’ve been hard on you,
but it’s only because your father and I want what’s best.
[Dad] And seeing your works on display
and the effects that they're having on everybody,
it's obvious to us now that you're doing exactly what you're meant to do.
translation.ko: 네게 맞는 일을 하고 있다는 게 확실해졌구나

translation.en: We’re just sorry we didn’t recognize it sooner.
Okay, I’m sorry. I need you just for one second.
but I included a photo session with you as part of the auction.
-That photo? You used that photo? -[Sarah laughs]
People have been bidding on it like crazy.
I’ve even been giving out your info, so you are gonna have a lotta work
translation.ko: 네 연락처 정보를 나눠주고 있어 새해에는 일이 많이 들어올 거야

translation.en: coming your way in the new year.
Oh yeah, he's in the auditorium
bidding on more of your art.
I am so proud of you.
Yeah. I’m just in shock over all this. That’s all.
translation.ko: 네, 지금 상황이 놀라워서 그래요 그게 다예요

translation.en: That answer might work for some people, but not me.
translation.ko: 그런 대답이 다른 사람들한테는 통할지 몰라도 나한테는 안 되지

translation.en: The first person I want to tell is Josh.
It’s too late to fix it.
But you already knew that, didn’t you?
It wouldn’t be much of a friendship if you gave up now,
I need to go do the mature thing.
I wondered if I'd see you here.
-Um, about the other-- -I want to say--
You don’t have to try to make me feel better.
For what it’s worth, you did warm me up a little to...
I guess I didn't understand how much that whole calendar thing meant.
translation.ko: 그 달력이 얼마나 의미가 있는 건지 이해하지 못했나 봐요

translation.en: Those are the most important things... -[Fernando sobs]
-This is beautiful! -that we could ever give each other.
I hate to be this person. Is Josh with you?
I think he’s on a date.
I don’t know. I saw him wearing his date shirt.
Yeah, you know, the shirt a guy wears when he wants to make a good impression?
translation.ko: 왜 있잖아, 잘 보이고 싶을 때 입는 셔츠

translation.en: Not one that’s off the floor?
Or he's in Florida visiting his parents.
I mean, it's a versatile shirt, really?
Well, which is it, Nando? Is it Florida? Is he on a date?
-[Abby] Hey. -[Sarah] What are you doing here?
[Abby] I just checked the trunk of my car.
I think some things in my trunk that I didn't plan on donating
translation.ko: 트렁크에 있던 물건들이 다 기부되었나 봐

translation.en: Like my-- A box of gifts from Ty.
I've been looking everywhere. I can't find it.
I think Laurie might have grabbed it.
Hey, I just-- That’s not even what I care about.
I mean, is there any chance it’s still here?
Yeah, well, we cleaned out. I mean, this was our biggest auction yet.
Maybe there’s a receipt or something.
This is Josh. Leave a message.
I totally deserve the silent treatment.
translation.ko: 나한테 말 안 하는 거 이해해

translation.en: You’re right. I’ve just been too wrapped up in myself
translation.ko: 네 말이 맞았어 좋은 친구가 되기엔

translation.en: to be a good friend, but I, uh--
I really want to make things right.
I can't imagine not having you in my life.
translation.ko: 네가 없는 인생은 상상할 수 없어

translation.en: [man] So, what have we got here?
Abby. Nice to talk to you again.
it’s so nice to- What a surprise!
Before you say anything, I just want to say I feel so terrible
about the tree-lighting photos, and, um,
Oh, those. We had to go with another submission,
translation.ko: 아, 그건 다른 사진들을 사용해야 했어요

translation.en: but that’s not why I’m calling.
I was at my son's school auction
You did? But I was there. I didn’t--
I guess I must have missed you.
I bid on the photo session with you and won.
but is there any chance you could do the session later today?
translation.ko: 혹시 오늘 오후에 같이 할 수 있나요?

translation.en: It's the last time I have free before heading out of town.
But I-- I’m sorry. I don’t have a studio.
That's okay. We can do it at my home.
I'll have my assistant send you all the information.
-I look forward to seeing you again. -You, too.
I have a house full of family and they all love the camera.
translation.ko: 가족들이 모두 왔어요 모두 사진 찍는 걸 좋아해요

translation.en: Yeah, that’s perfect. D'you wanna get in there, too?
You have a really wonderful family, Mayor Martinez.
Well, we're all fans of yours.
I have a feeling we’ll be working together more in the future.
translation.ko: 나중에 같이 일할 것 같은 예감이 드네요

translation.en: Thank you so much for coming.
[man] I love fixing these old cameras.
-All right, now it’s as good as new. -Woo! Merry Christmas.
Corinne, honey. You have one gift left.
That calendar that you gave me.
and it got sold at the school's auction.
angry? I mean, it was Grandma’s, and I lost it.
translation.ko: 화나지 않으세요? 할머니가 주신 건데 제가 잃어버렸잖아요

translation.en: Your grandmother was convinced it had magical powers.
translation.ko: 할머니는 달력에 마법의 힘이 있다고 믿었어

translation.en: She said it brought her to me.
What do you think about that?
That's exactly why she wanted it to go to you.
translation.ko: 바로 그 이유 때문에 할머니가 네게 주고 싶어했어

translation.en: Just like her, you pick the hardest path,
whether it’s in your career choice or in your personal life.
She knew the time would come
where you would need just a little extra help
translation.ko: 네 모든 소망과 노력했던 모든 것을 이루려면

translation.en: Everything you’re working so hard for.
She didn't want you to give up on your dream.
translation.ko: 할머니는 네가 꿈을 포기하지 않기를 바랐단다

translation.en: -The three little toys. -[Abby] Those are predicting the future.
translation.ko: - 꼬맹이 장난감 세 개네 - 미래를 예언해

translation.en: Day two, I got a Christmas tree toy, and then my car ran over a Christmas tree.
translation.ko: 둘째 날에는 크리스마스트리 장난감이 나왔어 차로 진짜 나무를 쳤다고

translation.en: [Ty] Says here we have a potential sprain by candy cane.
translation.ko: 지팡이 사탕 때문에 삔 것 같다고 쓰여 있네요

translation.en: [Abby] And his daughter was dressed as a nutcracker.
translation.ko: 그 애가 호두까기 인형 옷을 입고 있었어

translation.en: You can help me wrangle the kids.
He’s in the kitchen making a cup of tea.
Do you want to help me set the table?
Josh. He dropped it by earlier this morning.
He also dropped off a whole tin of Christmas cookies all the way from Florida.
translation.ko: 플로리다에서 크리스마스 과자를 한 상자 가져왔던데

translation.en: And Josh is back in town.
-You were in on it? -In on what?
Did you help Josh buy back that calendar?
I came in early to help Sarah set up, and I saw it sitting in a pile.
translation.ko: 세라 도와주려고 일찍 갔는데 달력이 거기 있더라

translation.en: But Josh gave it back to me, right?
Ah. Now, that question’s not for me to answer.
translation.ko: 그건 내가 대답할 게 아닌 것 같은데

translation.en: But what I can tell you is
the holiday calendar watches over you.
is the calendar magic or not?
Either way you define it, it ends up in the same place.
Speaking of which, now you need to get going or you’re gonna be late.
translation.ko: 그래서 말인데 지금 가지 않으면 늦을 것 같은데

translation.en: Ah, I prefer to call it romantic.
I can’t believe how long it’s taken me to realize that it’s you.
translation.ko: 너라는 걸 깨닫는 데 이렇게 오랜 시간이 걸리다니

translation.en: what was in the calendar today?
You took all my hints and got me a gift. [chuckles]
You wanna get out of the cold first?
Oh, we can’t break and enter.
translation.ko: 안 돼, 깨고 들어갈 순 없잖아

translation.en: I mean with a little bit of work...

translation.ko: 그렇지, 애비와 조시의 스튜디오에 오신 걸 환영해요

translation.en: Why are you under the impression that I’m this broke artist?
translation.ko: 왜 내가 파산한 예술가라고 생각하는 거야?

translation.en: Because you wore an elf costume and you were living at Fernando’s.
translation.ko: 요정 코스튬을 입고 페르난도 집에서 사니까 그렇지

translation.en: You still haven’t read my travel blog.
translation.ko: 내 여행 블로그를 아직도 안 읽었구나

translation.en: After a few months being away, I started freelancing.
translation.ko: 몇 달 쉰 후에 프리랜서로 일하기 시작했어

translation.en: If you didn’t know, I’m a big deal in the travel blog world.
translation.ko: 모르겠지만 여행 블로그 시장에서는 내가 꽤 잘나가

translation.en: So you used that money to rent this place?
translation.ko: 여기 임대하려고 돈 다 쓴 거야?

translation.en: of my parents and your Gramps.
He put a good word in for you.
I’m kind of a big deal.
♪ Your family is overseas So I'm glad you could spend it with me ♪
♪ Girl, light up that tree ♪ ♪ Girl, light up that tree This Christmas love won't stop ♪
Everyone, we just have an announcement.
-Just wanna wish you a... -[together] ...merry Christmas! ♪ Christmas, Christmas, Christmas time ♪
